title: Update Economic Empowerment program location to India (Jharkhand)

requirements.text: Update the "Economic Empowerment" program on the Programs & Impact page so its "Locations Served" text displays the location as "India, Jharkhand" (replacing the current non-India locations list). Apply this change anywhere the site currently displays the Economic Empowerment programâ€™s locations.
acceptanceCriteria: On /programs, the Economic Empowerment program card shows "Locations Served" as exactly: "India, Jharkhand".

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths (authentication hooks, main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui).
Keep all backend logic in the single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo); do not add additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not change the Economic Empowerment program title, status, description, or impact metrics.
Do not add new forms, backend storage, or admin functionality related to programs.
